name: Gourmet Cookalong
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving into the art of cooking and dining well, this experience helps you engage all five senses when you're in the kitchen. The caviar on the top is relishing a wonderful meal that you, along with a bunch of people, will cook together.The theme of this cookalong is Neapolitan Pizza.


The cookalong: Learn to make and stretch the Pizza Dough, assemble the pizza with toppings, taste different cheeses and the house sauce. Learn how to use a wood fired oven to bake pizzas.


The meal: Virgin Mojito, the Pizza that you make, Dessert.

Note: The cookalong includes vegetarian and non-vegetarian meal options.

name: The Art of Shibori
description:
An ancient Japanese textile art form, Shibori embodies both  craftsmanship and creative expression. Rooted in centuries of tradition, Shibori is more than just a technique; it is a philosophy that embraces the beauty of imperfection and the harmony between nature and human touch. This makes each outcome raw and different from one another.
This experience is an appreciation of the art of slowing down, of modern-day sensibilities still being relevant through age-old techniques, and of finding beauty and inspiration in all things that surround us.
The experience includes trying your hand at 3 different Shibori techniques to create your own customised design on a piece of fabric, under the guidance of an expert.

name: Hula Harmony
description:
A toy that was once designed for recreation, hula hooping gradually took the world by a storm, starting with the United States in the late 1950s. Today hula hooping is not just a playful activity, but also a form of exercise and artistic expression. A cultural phenomenon, influencing music, fashion, and dance.
This experience will involve a guided introduction to hula hooping, tricks and transitions and flow choreography through some fun activities!
location: Good Move Studios & Dance Academy, Koramangala, Bangalore

name: The Elixir of Life
description:
For those in the know, Kombucha has steadily risen the ranks to be known as the ‘Elixir of Life’  - a drink that does wonders to your gut health. This experience helps you trace the journey of Kombucha from an ancient Chinese beverage to becoming an artisanal super-brew that has the world curious and excited for.
Discover the process of brewing kombucha, making your own kombucha starter, and then tasting some of the ‘booch – all peppered with some tasty anecdotes from the expert!
This Kombucha Tasting will comprise a guided blind-tasting of the 5-6 Kombucha flavours, along with an insight into the origins, making and benefits of the elixir.

name: Chocolate Wonderland
description:
Indulge in the world of premium couverture chocolates - the real deal - and get hands on with the basics of artisanal chocolate making.
This delightful experience will have you indulge in premium chocolate sourced from the best locations, and learn delectable chocolate recipes under the guidance of expert chocolatiers.
location: Chocolate Philosophy Studio, RT Nagar, Bangalore

name: Art & Soul
description:
We live in times of relentless stimulation and constant influx of information. Most of us are looking for ways to pause, filter out the superfluous noise and connect with our own selves better. For some people, who have a hard time articulating what they are feeling, self-expression through art and movement can be therapeutic.
The theme for this art and movement experience is ‘Still and Still Moving’: a movement & writing based therapeutic exploration.
In this theme, participants will experience more self-awareness through movement explorations as well as some theatre-based activities. The experience will aim to build meaningful connections between the individual and the collective. It will also improve the individual’s own connection with their sense of spatial, physical and emotional awareness.
location: Good Moves Studio & Dance Academy, Koramangala, Bangalore

name: Treasures From The Estates
description:
Switch from coffee enthusiast to aficionado in this unique coffee appreciation experience. Delve into the world of premium Indian Estate Coffees, and learn the nuances of brewing and tasting single-origin brews, including a cold one.
This immersive experience helps you develop a keen sense of understanding about unique Indian coffees and what makes them special. We will cover three brewing methods - AeroPress, FrenchPress and Pour Over.
Join us for the Brunch edit. Enjoy Trove’s signature coffee brewing experience alongside a special breakfast menu curated by Chef Ashley of Monkey Bar.
Attendees can opt for either a vegetarian or non-vegetarian set breakfast menu, which will include all items mentioned below.


Veg Meal: Chole Bhature, Mini Fruit Bowl, and Mini Muffin.

Non Veg Meal: Mushroom & Cheese Omelette (with a slice of bread, butter & side salad), Mini Muesli Bowl, and Mini Muffin.

Fresh watermelon juice will be served to all attendees.

name: Gourmet Cookalong
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving into the art of cooking, this experience helps you engage all five senses when you're in the kitchen.The theme for this cookalong is Asian cuisine - Dim Sum making.
Cookalong: Learn to make and steam Dim sums from scratch, options include; Pan fried chicken dim sum (non- veg) , Spicy Broccoli with cream cheese dim sum (veg) ,Vegetables fried wonton (veg).
Menu: A welcome drink, the Dim Sums that you make along with a variety of house made Dim sums and Chinese tea. 
 Note: The cookalong includes vegetarian and non-vegetarian options.

name: The Craft of Mixology
description:
Discover the world of cocktails and spirits and learn how to balance your own cocktail concoction under the guidance of expert mixologists.
The experience will include a quick introduction to different spirits, cocktail making techniques, bar equipment, interesting garnishing tips along with various stories and myths around cocktails and spirits.
